bashFallbacks.fullContent:
# For Script Includes:
npm run trace-lineage -- <ScriptName> script
npm run query -- script-crud <ScriptName>
npm run validate-change -- script <ScriptName>
npm run query -- script-forward <ScriptName>
npm run query -- script-backward <ScriptName>

# For Tables:
npm run query -- table-schema <table_name>
npm run query -- table-dependencies <table_name>
npm run trace-backward -- <table_name> table

# For Components:
npm run trace-impact -- <ComponentName>
npm run trace-lineage -- <ComponentName>

avoidanceReasons.description: Agent used bash commands instead of MCP tools

recommendations.recommendation: Agent is using bash fallback instead of native MCP tools
recommendations.action: Verify MCP server is running and tools are available
Review error messages and fix underlying issues
